title: AI-Powered Image Editor
description: A Next.js web application with AI-powered image editing, collaborative design, and cloud storage integration.

title: Toolbear - Full-Stack E-commerce Platform
description: A MERN stack e-commerce platform with secure user authentication, payments, and an admin dashboard.

title: AI Cover Letter Generator
description: A Next.js web application with AI-powered cover letter generation. It uses HuggingFace's API to generate cover letters based on user input and Resume data.

title: Kunji.link - URL Shortener
description: A full-stack URL shortener with user authentication and rate limiting.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A Netflix-inspired movie streaming UI using TMDB API with authentication via Appwrite.

title: Done It - Note-Taking App
description: A minimalist note-taking app with a mobile-first design.
